title: Summoners' Society is looking for Content Creators
body:
Hey everyone, I'm Panda from the OCE community Summoners' Society, we run multiple tournaments and creative competitions every month with RP prizing, we have well over 7000 members and we try to generate as much discussion about League of Legends as we can ^_^ (check out the group here: https://www.facebook.com/groups/SummonersSocietyOCE/). 

We are looking for people to contribute fresh content into the Oceanic community, if you would like to make videos, edit videos, make guides, draw, sculpt, cosplay, bake, cook, or just generally entertain then take a look at the application form:
https://docs.google.com/forms/d/1kOzs2yrLTe8OsrvUqFSrdswcKLw8MWraTaP_dU8cbm0

If you have any questions feel free to leave them as comments on this post or fill out the application and we can discuss after that 
{{sticker:slayer-jinx-wink}}
